function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid spread of unverified information through social media","Impact":"Increased likelihood of cyberchondria and misinformation sharing","Mitigation":"Promotion of fact-checking and critical thinking skills, regulation of misinformation on social media platforms","Technologies":"Fact-checking algorithms, AI-driven content moderation","People":"General public, social media users","Owner":"Social media platforms, government regulators"},{"Description":"Escalation of social media consumption during lockdowns","Impact":"Increased risk of cyberchondria and misinformation sharing","Mitigation":"Promotion of healthy social media usage, development of digital well-being tools","Technologies":"Digital well-being apps, usage monitoring tools","People":"Individuals, social media users","Owner":"Tech companies, health organizations"},{"Description":"Incorporation of health risk and technological factors in misinformation sharing","Impact":"Amplification of cyberchondria and spread of misinformation","Mitigation":"Education on health literacy and critical appraisal of online information, regulation of misinformation dissemination","Technologies":"Health literacy apps, online information evaluation tools","People":"General public, internet users","Owner":"Health organizations, education institutions"}]}
